text: @realDonaldTrump You felt obama was a secret muslim. You felt unemployment was 42% under obama. You felt that your tax cut woud result in 6% growth. You felt the coronavirus was like a flu. You felt healthcare was easy. You felt trade wars are easy to win. Spare us your f ing feelings. You feel?
